short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension displays a rotating slide deck of Announcements.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Find all the announcements you need for the Anderson Five Career Center along with an agenda view of the Faculty Calendar.

Revisions
1.1.1 - Slowed down scroll on Announcement slides and added duty roster calendar to Agenda
